name: COMM-IT Group
description: Established in 2009 with a group of consultants having more that 50 years of combined experience in Asset Management space, we made rapid strides based on our consulting & quality oriented approach. We have one of the biggest clientele in the region in Oil & Gas, Shipping, Ports and Banks.
features: Seamless transition to better ways of doing business
sub_categories: Software and Services Related to HR Software
tags: Hire Top Talent Faster and More Efficiently
Boost Hiring Manager Confidence and Productivity
Headline: At COMM-iT, we use client-centric approach to optimize our clients’ operations and maintenance costs.
ShortDescription: We are a consulting firm specializing in Asset Management, ERP & Business Analytic Solutions serving customers in ASEAN & beyond for more than 10 years. We are the hub for leading technology solutions from IBM, Infor, Microsoft, Qlik, Hitachi & others.
enhanced_description: Established in 2009, COMM-IT Group is a consulting firm with over 50 years of combined experience in the Asset Management space, specializing in ERP and Business Analytic Solutions. They adopt a client-centric, quality-oriented approach to optimize clients' operations and maintenance costs. Serving customers in ASEAN and beyond, COMM-IT Group boasts a significant clientele in industries such as Oil & Gas, Shipping, Ports, and Banks. They act as a hub for leading technology solutions from partners including IBM, Infor, Microsoft, Qlik, and Hitachi.
key_use_cases: Talent acquisition and recruitment process improvement
competitive_advantages: Over 50 years of combined experience in Asset Management
One of the biggest clienteles in the ASEAN region within target industries
Expertise as a hub for leading technology solutions from major vendors (IBM, Infor, Microsoft, Qlik, Hitachi)
Focus on optimizing operations and maintenance costs
Ability to facilitate seamless transition to improved business processes
roi_benefits: Seamless transition to better business processes
